data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/oE4I9cKrflZEPvn2MXLUY9ux008.jpg","id":47454,"title":"Presentation, or Charlotte and Her Steak","original_title":"Présentation ou Charlotte et son steak","overview":"Two young people, Walter and Charlotte, are walking through a small village in Switzerland a snowy winter day. Walter introduces Charlotte to Clara, hoping to make Charlotte jealous. After saying good-bye to Clara, Walter accompanies Charlotte into her house, although she doesn't want him to. Charlotte is hungry and cooks a steak. She asks Walter if he wants a piece of it. He says no, but she gives him a small piece anyway. He wants a kiss, and she says no. She starts to compare herself with Clara, who Walter agrees is more beautiful. In spite of this, Walter says he likes Charlotte much more, but she thinks he is lying. She notices that he is cold and shivering. She hugs him, he kisses her, and she starts kissing him. After leaving the house he accompanies her to the train.","poster_path":"/44zQGy9oL8gexayEzx1rYzNbcrN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35,10749],"popularity":4.915,"release_date":"1961-11-20","video":false,"vote_average":5.655,"vote_count":29},{"backdrop_path":"/akVbOIoL0ngCL8Ryuje4OKf7VKx.jpg","id":68491,"title":"Canine Casanova","original_title":"Canine Casanova","overview":"Pluto spots Dinah the dachshund and is smitten, but she ignores him.
